item.title: Autobiography
item.description: My name is Hayley Briar and I am nearing the very end of my program to obtain my Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Elementary Education and Mild to Moderate Special Education from Grand Canyon University. Special Education has been a passion of mine since I graduated high school and immediately landed an instructional assistant position in a moderate to severe Autism program. I knew I had found my calling in this life and continued working in various programs in age groups from elementary up to an adult transition program until this school year.
